full_summary:
## Tender Announcement

### Administrative Assistant, General

#### Solicitation Number: W6431-230109

*Publication Date: 2023-06-05*

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking the services of an Administrative Assistant, General, Senior Level to support the Exercise and Simulation (E&S) Branch of the RCAF Aerospace Warfare Centre (AWC). The resource will perform various administrative duties to support the E&S Branch activities, working on-site at the AWC.

**Background**

The E&S Branch requires supplemental support to maintain the delivery of its activities. This support will be provided on an as-needed basis by an Administrative Assistant, General.

**Tender Details**

* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-06-20 at 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-07-04
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-05-31
* **Tender Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Contract Requirements**

* The successful bidder will be required to provide an Administrative Assistant, General to support the E&S Branch of the RCAF Aerospace Warfare Centre.
* The resource will be responsible for performing various administrative duties, including:
	+ Providing administrative support to the E&S Branch.
	+ Maintaining accurate records and filing systems.
	+ Coordinating meetings and travel arrangements.
	+ Preparing and submitting reports, as required.
* The work will be performed on-site at the RCAF Aerospace Warfare Centre.

**Eligibility**

* This tender is open to all qualified contractors.
* Bidders must be either foreign or Canadian companies with a registered address in Canada.

**Trade Agreements**

The following trade agreements apply to this tender:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* NAFTA

**Tender Documents**

The tender documents are available on the Canada Buys website at the following URL:
https://canadabuys
